stories.text:
Hi! I've had a few programming jobs over the last 2/3 years(mostly at startups, and also for one Fortune 500 company as a contractor), and I really struggle mentally, I can't take the pressure of most regular programming jobs, the deadlines, the meetings, the hierarchy, the constant need to stay on top of new tech, it's really burning me out.

I'm looking for something less stressful/demanding, but still in tech. I'm OK with earning less, do you have any idea of what kind of jobs I could look for? Thanks
stories.title: Ask HN: What's the easiest/lowest pressure tech job you know of?
